p: Immunogenicity: In the serological assay, the highest percent NPC-specific antibody reaction at baseline was observed in P7 at 12%. Most of the patients showed similar or lower levels of response at 1 month (while on immunosuppressants) and 6 months (off immunosuppressants) post-implantation, with none exceeding 12% ( Fig. 1A). In the cytotoxicity assay the highest of three values for a given time period was used for scoring. The highest baseline observed was for P1 (23%). None of the patients exceeded the 23% baseline at their 1- or 6-month follow-up ( Fig. 1B).
